item.title: Upgrading emacs on debian
item.description: Been playing with elfeed on Emacs 26.1 on buster and it keeps crashing. I think for font related reasons. So lets follow the Emacs Wiki Instructions to upgrade to emacs-snapshots and see if that helps. Add the snap shot repository. Make sure you have the tools installed so that apt can do it's internet thing. sudo apt-get install software-properties-common sudo apt-get update Add the signing key: wget -q http://emacs.
